name: 旅途
description:
This is Parkour.

The theme of the game is very simple, you need to constantly jump obstacles, to run higher scores, with your skills to run as far as possible!

Operation mode:

Automatic movement, the longer the time, the faster the automatic movement.

Up / jump

Jump left ↑ + ←

Jump right ↑ + →

Features of the game:

Complex terrain

The tense atmosphere of the game.

Fast paced experience

Hit the keyboard, operate accurately, let your character run further!
